name: Sleepy Pharaoh
description:
"I was just resting peacefully and I woke up in a pyramid !"

Sleepy Pharaoh is a short game where you play as a pharaoh who woke up burried by accident in a pyramid where nothing makes sense.

°•.•°o.O 💤 O.o°•.•°•

Features :

  • Solve boulder puzzles by pushing them.
  • Lose your sense of direction in a pyramid with doors that doesn't make sense.

°•.•°o.O 💤 O.o°•.•°•

Controls :

  • Move : Directionnal Arrow / ZQSD
  • Reset a Room : Press R
  • Pause : Press P
  • Push a rock : Move towards the rock
  • Open a door : Move towards the door

°•.•°o.O 💤 O.o°•.•°•

This game was made by 2 students from e-artsup Paris in their 3rd Year of  studies as a part of a school project.

Given themes :

  • Its not supposed to do that
  • It never ends

°•.•°o.O 💤 O.o°•.•°•

Creative Coding :

Kyllian BONNIER (Programming, Level Design, UI, Sounds (using SFXR), Particles)

Game Artist :

Laura BETTINI (Sprites, UI, Animations)

°•.•°o.O 💤 O.o°•.•°•

Musics and all SFX are Royalty Free
